attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. The Renault Kadjar is comfortable, redefined and comes packed with equipment making it one of the most stylish crossovers. Its great on the road, whether you in the urban jungle or on the open roads taking a long drive. It handles well on the road and offers a smooth ride every time. The interior is spacious and comfortable, so whether you in the passenger seat or taking the controls, you wont be cramped for space. The Kadjar come with built in navigation, and the media player allows for USB, Bluetooth connectivity and aux input as well.

Offer includes free gift of your choice from one of the following options:
- Smash & Grab tint
- Auto Armor ( 2 in 1)
- R1000 fuel voucher  

•	We deliver countrywide
•	Trade-ins Welcome
•	Finance Arranged

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. If you have an adventurous spirit and want to take this to a new level, Then the Nissan Juke is aimed at you. Its design is out of the box with the front having the appearance of a mini SUV, the rear a more conventional, hatchback look and It’s falling roofline gives the Juke a coupé-like appearance. The interior is spacious and comfortable, has leather seats and fair leg room for you and your passengers.  Driving the Juke is a pleasure, whether you on the open road or travelling around the suburbs. The Juke is not just a vehicle for making a fashion statement, it’s a good driver’s car with a healthy turn of speed, is generously equipped and well-priced.

•	We deliver countrywide
•	Trade-ins Welcome
•	Finance Arranged

Go ahead, make the most of every day.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 5 year/200 000km Warranty
Last Service - 05/09/2022 @116 505km Full Service History

The 5th generation Honda CR-V is powered by a naturally aspirated 2.0litre engine that pushes out 113kW of power with a fuel consumption of 7.3l/100km on average. Honda claims that the 4th generation CR-V was the worlds best selling SUV. Features include LED Daytime running lights, fog lights, LED taillights, 17" Alloy Rims, as well as brushed aluminum roof racks. The interior has upholstery seats with a soft-touch instrument panel that includes a digital information interface. The 5" infotainment system offers clear images from the rear view camera as well as hands free Bluetooth connectivity with music streaming functions, USB, Auxiliary jack and two 12V sockets. Other notable features include dual-zone climate control, rear parking sensors, front and rear electric windows, electric side mirrors and electric parking brake. Book your test drive today and make it yours!

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
